alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan; Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 22 at 1:14AM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Callahan, northwestern Brown and northeastern Coleman Counties through 200 AM CDT... At 114 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Atwell, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cross Plains, Putnam, Rowden, May, Atwell, Cross Cut, Oplin and Admiral. This includes Interstate 20 between Mile Markers 314 and 318. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 200 AM CDT for west central Texas.
